root.ad_description_full: Type: Fishing Boats Sales status: available Manufacturer: Other Model:Fishing Boat Model:Fishing Boat Mooring Country: United Kingdom Trade in possible: yes Propulsion: Outboard Engine manufacturer:Tohastu Engine manufacturer:Tohastu HP: 50 About Fishing Boat £4995 Fitted with a brand New Tohastu 50hp 2 stroke outboard with 4 years warranty. Brand new battery, automatic bilge pump. She is 17.5 ft with a 7ft beam and also comes with a Garmin GPS 550S Chart plotter/ fish finder. Also included in the sale is a brand new inflatable dinghy along with 200mtrs of anchor rope and an anchor and chain. There is a trailer available if needed.
